mapper.select: select mr.id,mr.patient_card_id as userId,mr.date,mr.description,d.name as doctorName, mr.checkinfo,mr.disease_history,mr.diagnosis, mr.comment,mr.remark,mr.diagnostictype,mr.status,mr.insurance_type, p.name,p.sex,p.birthday,p.tel,md.name as deptName from medical_record mr join patient_user_info_card p on mr.patient_card_id=p.id join doctor d on d.id=mr.doctor_id join medical_dept md on md.id=mr.dept_id where 1=1 and p.name like '%${name}%' and d.name like '%${doctor_name}%' and md.id=${dept_id} and mr.date= STR_TO_DATE('${date}','%Y-%m-%d') and mr.status!=3 limit ${length} offset #{start}
